title: Pbe
body: So I discovered recently that my account has had the wrong email attached to it and I wanted to know if on the off chance an acceptance for being a pbe tester email was sent to that email and i cant access it would i ever get another chance.

replies.body:
I pulled up your account and it doesn't look like you've been invited to PBE quite yet, so no worries there! If you hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we should be able to update that email with the correct one. That way when you do get invited you'll be able to get the email!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
